label: PID15654
description: Smart Plug with two USB ports

paramInformation.label: Overload Protection
paramInformation.description: If current exceeds 16.5A over 5 seconds, relay will turn off.

paramInformation.label: Notification on Load Change
paramInformation.description: Smart Plug can send notifications to association device load state changes.

paramInformation.label: Indicator Modes
paramInformation.description: LED in the device will indicate the state of load

paramInformation.label: Threshold of power report
paramInformation.description: Power Threshold at which to send meter report

paramInformation.label: Percentage Threshold to Trigger Power Report
Power Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending power report to association device (Group Lifeline).

paramInformation.label: Energy Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending energy report to association device (Group Lifeline).

paramInformation.label: Voltage Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The interval of sending voltage report to association device (Group Lifeline)
